title: Verona
page_copy: Verona Radio Stations on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.  Get in touch via the Contact Us below if you're interested in these apps. Also, find the top new songs, playlists, and music on our website!

radio_info.short: Radio-RCS, has been present for 20 years in the world of ether and entertainment radio Verona plays Top 40/Pop, Adult Contemporary, Sports Talk programs.
